bug.author: HandsomeLuoyang
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>I get an error when running.</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52132083/81647262-48a81380-945f-11ea-93df-f49df331dbbd.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>how can i solve it?</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Hello, thank you for reporting this. Can you please double check the version of the scrapbook module you have installed? If you followed the setup instructions, a conda environment forecasting_env is created from the tools/environment.yaml file. In this file we're installing a specific version of scrapbook module, nteract-scrapbook==0.3.1, so this is the version that should be installed. We also provide instructions on how to register this environment as a Jupyter kernel, so the installed packages are accessible from the notebooks. Could you confirm that you followed these steps? If you open a python session in the environment forecasting_env created from the yaml file, and try running the following few commands, this is what the output should look like: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15053814/81721139-41b7db80-9434-11ea-9a5e-3b1ebd53cbbd.png></denchmark-link>

Sorry, I installed the library in the wrong way. Now I've installed it the right way and it's ready to use. I sincerely thank you for your help. And the right way to install the library is pip install nteract-scrapbook==0.3.1ã€‚
Hi, great, glad you solved it. Thanks for reaching out.
